3: Gargh... I, Golden Jegan, have fallen so easily... What a shame...
After Golden Jegan was defeated, he took out the artifact fragment that he had been protecting just like other Demon Generals. This was probably a system setting.
The battle is over.
The Demon General closed his eyes, but Lucia pulled her blade back.
Um, aren't you going to finish me off?
Like I said, I didn't want to use violence. Plus, there's still something we want to know from you.
Hmph. As heroes of revelation, you are quite different...
Just like Karenina said... Have you been watching us all along?
Of course... That's why I also know who you are looking for.
Indeed... That's how His Majesty calls her.
She's further away, with His Majesty. They didn't go past here.
Wait a sec. Are you suggesting Liv is with the Demon King?
Correct. She met His Majesty ever since she arrived in this world, and they have been moving together.
...But the stone monument said the Demon King was already killed by the heroes. Did he come back to life again?
Before the last Demon King was destroyed, he separated a small potion of his power, which became the Demon King now...
He also realized his mistake and asked us to never harm humans again. But we never thought the humans would come at us this time.
So he decided to start his plan after you arrived here...
You call Liv the Holy Maiden. Does she have anything to do with that plan?
Of course... Only she can save us Demons.
And this world.
By going to the Demon King's Castle.
On their way to the Demon King's Castle.
The Demon King's Castle?
But the gate can only be opened after all artifact fragments are collected!
It's called the 'Demon King's Castle.' Do you think a castle will not respond to its owner?
Not to mention the Goddess' artifact was originally... Wait, what's this...?
What's wrong?
The conversation was interrupted as Golden Jegan became very anxious. He looked very shocked, then started to panic.
Heroes from afar, I am going to use my magic to launch the artifact away. Please follow it.
Hah? Are you eating your words already?
No, but His Majesty and the Holy Maiden are in danger. As a Demon General, I cannot go out!
Please, go help them!
